column4: hey, I'm wondering if someone might be able to help me set up CUPS

hey everyone, I just installed ubuntu 5.04 on a dell lattitude D610 and my wireless connection keeps getting dropped ... it works again when I restart, but it happens rather frequently ... any ideas what might cause this?
I have the same problem with 5.10 and a rt2570 chipset... odd
yeah, or open System, Preferences, Networking and active it thene
